-- Anachronox --

Anachronox shakes his head, "Not afraid, more like anxious." He 
hefts the last panel, walks over to the pile, and puts it on 
top. "Panels are off, crane is good to go."


--- In nbwrpg@y..., "warriorazure" <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> Jetstorm stops for a second, thinking.
> 
> Jetstorm: How should I know? I have been here for some times, but 
I 
> think the reformatting process has affected some of my memory 
> circuits. Daemos showed us there were many sparks near the hot 
spot, 
> so there could be a good chance that we kick some metal asses. 
Why'd 
> ya ask? Afraid to fight?
> 
> He finishes to lock the first part of the crane.
>
